meanings.definition: The quality or state of being grammatical.
meanings.sent1: Her essay was praised for its grammaticalness.
meanings.sent2: The teacher emphasized the importance of grammaticalness in writing.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, his grammaticalness seemed to elude him.
meanings.sent4: The grammaticalness of her speech was like music to my ears.
meanings.sent5: The grammaticalness of the document made it easy to understand.

meanings.definition: The degree to which a sentence or phrase conforms to the rules of grammar.
meanings.sent1: The grammaticalness of his sentences made them easy to read.
meanings.sent2: She always checks the grammaticalness of her emails before sending them.
meanings.sent3: The grammaticalness of the robot's speech amused the audience.
meanings.sent4: His grammaticalness was a shining example for all students.
meanings.sent5: The grammaticalness of the poem added to its beauty.
